summary: Completed frontend testing of Activity Log PDF Export features - Item Type column and Employee Payout Report. All features working correctly.
passed_tests: Activity Log page loads correctly with Payout Report and Export PDF buttons visible in header
Payout Report button (data-testid='payout-report-btn') opens modal dialog correctly
Employee Payout Report modal contains all required fields: Employee select, Hourly Rate, Hours Worked, Date From, Date To
Form validation works - Export button disabled when required fields (Employee, Hourly Rate, Hours Worked) are empty
Form validation works - Export button enabled after filling required fields
Calculated Total Pay displays correctly in real-time (tested: $25 * 40 = $1000.00, $18.50 * 32 = $592.00)
Employee Payout Report PDF exports successfully with filename format: payout_report_{employee_name}_{date}.pdf
Success toast 'Payout report exported successfully!' displays after PDF export
Modal closes automatically after successful PDF export
Activity Log PDF Export button (data-testid='export-pdf-btn') works correctly
Activity Log PDF includes 'Item Type' column in the Activity Details table
Product type labels display correctly in activity feed UI (Rim, Standard Caps badges visible)
PRODUCT_TYPE_LABELS mapping correctly converts product_type values to readable labels (rim -> 'Rim', steering_wheel -> 'Steering Wheel', etc.)
Date range filter (Date From/To) fields work in Payout Report modal
critical_code_review_comments: Code is well-structured with proper data-testid attributes for all interactive elements
PRODUCT_TYPE_LABELS constant at lines 49-59 provides proper mapping for all product types
exportPDF function (line 191) correctly includes Item Type column with PRODUCT_TYPE_LABELS mapping
exportPayoutPDF function (line 314) correctly calculates total pay and filters activities by date range
Form validation properly disables export button until required fields are filled
seed_data_creation: No seed data created - used existing production data
context_for_next_testing_agent: Activity Log page at /activity-log route has two PDF export features: 1) Export PDF button exports activity log with Item Type column showing product types (Rim, Steering Wheel, Standard Caps, etc.), 2) Payout Report button opens modal to generate employee payout reports with hourly rate * hours worked calculation. Key data-testids: payout-report-btn, export-pdf-btn, payout-employee-select, payout-hourly-rate, payout-hours-worked, payout-date-from, payout-date-to, export-payout-btn. PRODUCT_TYPE_LABELS mapping in ActivityLogPage.jsx converts product_type values to readable labels.
